channel.title: Need help with 5 things of autospawn.cfg
channel.description:
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--[b]RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType[/b]-Description[
The B. I already tryed to learn it. I dont understand. I need it for my project to spawn Allmost Npc's. Need it for SteenScape. ;)

item.title: Need help with 5 things of autospawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

[quote=“Steen, post:4, topic:118629”][quote author=Liam123 link=topic=167997.msg1560977#msg1560977 date=1183310012]
Range is the co-ords it walks too like, in a circle or w/e. change them to the co-ord’s for spawning IF you want them to stay still. If not, change it to the range you want them to walk too

[/quote]

Lets say i want it to make round of 5 by 5.
A space is one tile and an enter is one tile.
SP = Spawn.
It walks to X1 then Y1 then Y2 and then X2?
X1 Y1

SP

X2 Y2[/quote]

It wouldn’t walk to X1 then Y1 its walks to X1 Y1 both of those coordinates make up one spot, and since your other question wasn’t answered…WalkType set to 2 to stand still, 1 to move

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with 5 things of autospawn.cfg

Liam123:

Range is the co-ords it walks too like, in a circle or w/e. change them to the co-ord’s for spawning IF you want them to stay still. If not, change it to the range you want them to walk too

Lets say i want it to make round of 5 by 5.
A space is one tile and an enter is one tile.
SP = Spawn.
It walks to X1 then Y1 then Y2 and then X2?
X1 Y1

SP

X2 Y2
